name: Kick
description:
Kick is a single player game in which player assumes the character of a football player whose dream is to play soccer at its greatest stage. As you practice in different alleys surrounded by obstacles (trash cans, fire hydrants) your awareness, speed and precision is going to come handy if you are going to avoid smashing your ball into people’s windows. Yanks! 

  • smash a window->you lose points
  • ball hits a wall->you earn points
  • last long enough->You become the king of kick. Yeah!
